ORDER BY m.mem_is_active DESC, CASE WHEN m.member_id = 999999 OR m.position_code = 99 THEN 0 WHEN m.position_code = 17 THEN 999 ELSE p.mem_position_sequence END ASC, m.mem_hire_date ASC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{perPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE mem_is_active = '1'

AND M.dept_code = #{deptCode}
AND M.mem_is_active = '1'
AND( M.mem_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR M.member_id LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR D.mem_dept_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY mem_is_active DESC, CASE WHEN M.member_id = 999999 OR M.position_code = 99 THEN 0 WHEN M.position_code = 17 THEN 999 ELSE P.mem_position_sequence END ASC, M.mem_hire_date ASC

AND M.mem_is_active = '1'

INSERT INTO member_leave ( mem_leave_year, mem_leave_total_days, mem_leave_used_days, mem_leave_created_at, mem_leave_updated_at, member_id ) SELECT YEAR(NOW()), mp.mem_position_leave_days, 0.0, NOW(), NOW(), #{memberId} FROM member_position mp WHERE mp.member_position_code = #{positionCode}
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, m.dept_code AS deptCode, m.position_code AS positionCode, d.mem_dept_name, p.mem_position_name, ( SELECT mem_profile_saved_name FROM member_profile WHERE member_id = m.member_id AND mem_profile_is_active = true LIMIT 1 ) AS memProfileSavedName FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_dept d ON m.dept_code = d.member_dept_code LEFT JOIN member_position p ON m.position_code = p.member_position_code WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_dept_code, mem_dept_name FROM member_dept ORDER BY member_dept_code ASC

mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_name = #{memName}, mem_zip_code = #{memZipCode}, mem_address = #{memAddress}, mem_address_detail = #{memAddressDetail}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, position_code = #{positionCode} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE member_profile SET mem_profile_original_name = #{originalName}, mem_profile_saved_name = #{savedName}, mem_profile_created_at = NOW(), mem_profile_is_active = 1 WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_profile ( mem_profile_original_name, mem_profile_saved_name, mem_profile_created_at, mem_profile_is_active, member_id ) VALUES ( #{originalName}, #{savedName}, NOW(), 1, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_is_active = #{memIsActive}, mem_left_date = now() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_leave ( mem_leave_year, mem_leave_total_days, mem_leave_used_days, mem_leave_created_at, mem_leave_updated_at, member_id ) SELECT YEAR(NOW()), mp.mem_position_leave_days + ( (YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(m.mem_hire_date)) * 1.0 ), 0.0, NOW(), NOW(), m.member_id FROM member m JOIN member_position mp ON m.position_code = mp.member_position_code WHERE m.mem_is_active = 1
